name: Detachment
description:
Project Description:

Detachment is a classic point & click adventure game about 78-year-old Charlie and his struggles. The game was developed by our team as a university project in the second semester of B.A. Digital Games at Cologne Game Lab. The theme for this project was: Blank Page

I was the narrative designer in this project. I wrote the story as well as all the dialogues and monologues in the game. I also designed the narrative structure based on the story subject and the genre of the game.

Group Members:

- Anton Sinner (Project Lead, Sound Designer, Composer)

- Nastaran Namei (Artist & Animator)

- David Searle (Programmer)

- Mona Shayeghi (Gameplay Designer

- Ehsan Tabesh (Narrative Designer)
